title: $ADA: Crypto Analyst Expects Cardano ‘To Absolutely Explode Going Into the Next Bull Market’
description: Popular cryptocurrency analyst Dan Gambardello has recently revealed that he expects the price of the smart contract platform Cardano ($ADA) to “absolutely explode going into the next bull market” based on the growth of its decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. In a post Gambardello shared with his over 240,000 followers on the microblogging platform X, he […]
